thread.title: Good place to stay in Rome -
thread.title_full: Good place to stay in Rome - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Sheila K
title: Good place to stay in Rome -
text: A very clean and bright hotel close to the railway station. Our room was very comfortable with a view across the road to a small park area. The bathroom was spotless. Breakfast was served from 7-10.30am and had a good variety of food. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. A very enjoyable stay.
